name: Pink Ting Star Bomb
description: Pink Ting Star Bomb is the new escape game from ajazgames. The essential thing about this game is detecting the bomb wire to blow up the door from your trapped status, For instance you must struggle to find clue to solve some of the complicated puzzles, you will end up in finding some objects that would be too difficult to find, let me give you a simple clue, you would find ice tray, fill ice tray with water from the nearby tap, then open the fridge keep the water filled ice tray in close the fridge door, open again take the ice cubes, use it on the fire
